```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

It contains monthly foot traffic information for 20,000 stores in Baltimore City, Baltimore County, and Anne Arundel County from Jan to July 2024 (NAICS=44,45,71,72, 81). For each store, we have the aggregate foot traffic for the month, the same-month foot traffic last year, and the rate of change. You can also find information about the number of unique visitors and their proximityâ€”whether they are from nearby or outside the county.

```{r}
foot <- read_csv("baltimore_foot_traffic.csv")
```

```{r}
glimpse(foot)
```

#Biggest losers

```{r}
loser <- focus |> 
  select(location_name, street_address, dln_visits_yoy, start) |> 
  filter(start > "2024-03-02") |> 
 arrange(dln_visits_yoy)


winners <- focus |>
  select(location_name, street_address, dln_visits_yoy, start) |> 
  filter(start > "2024-03-02") |> 
  filter(dln_visits_yoy > 0) |>
  arrange(desc(dln_visits_yoy))

foot <- foot |>
  select(location_name, street_address, dln_visits_yoy, start) |> 
  filter(start > "2024-03-02") |> 
  arrange(dln_visits_yoy)

```

# Table

```{r}
library(kableExtra)
table_output <- loser %>%
  kbl(caption = "Baltimore Businesses Losing Customers") %>%
  kable_classic(full_width = F, html_font = "Cambria") %>%
  column_spec(1, bold = T, border_right = T) %>%
  column_spec(2, bold = F, border_right = T) |> 
  column_spec(3, width = "5em", background = "yellow") |> 
column_spec(4, bold = F, border_right = T) 

cat("<style>
    .caption {
      font-size: 30px !important;
    }
    </style>")
table_output


```

```{r}
install.packages("ggmap")
library(ggmap)
library(tidyverse)

foot <- foot |>
  mutate(fulladdress = paste(street_address, city, region, postal_code, sep=","))
```
